alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cass and northwestern Crow Wing Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Leader, or 17 miles northwest of Brainerd, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pequot Lakes, Pine River, Hackensack, Backus, Leader, Gull Lake, Lake Shore, Jenkins, Chickamaw Beach, Pheasant Lake, Lake Ada, Casino, Pontoria, and Big Portage Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass
